forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.
